name: ToyCarSim
description:
Drive around as a little toy car, and play minigames that are placed around buildings.

Controls are simple:

  • Move with WASD
  • Escape pauses the game
  • UI Interactions with mouse

Enjoy

Game Created by:

  • Mark Braasch (https://subbucket.itch.io/)
  • Geumseong Han (https://taengyi.itch.io/)
  • Tobias Heukäufer (https://iche20.itch.io/)

Music Created by Lucas Gusev, a friend of one of us:

Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTBIMsNpyoxiUZ5T8OCn8BA

Music used: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3I9FgJeGmRg

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai

"Games A Week" (Winter Semester 2020/21)
